page.title: 19A Day in the Life of...
page.content: ON MONDAY MORNING I GET UP AT 7.50AM SO I HAVE TIME TO GET MY CLOTHES ON AND GET WASHED.THAT COMES TO ABOUT 8.00 THEN I GET MY BREAKFAST.I HAVE A FRIED EGG FOR BREAKFAST AND SOME COFFEE AND THEN AT 8.30 I GO TO THE PAPER SHOP THEN I GO TO THE BUS STOP WHERE THE BUS IS WAITING.I GO TO SCHOOL ON A TRIMDON MOTOR SERVICE BUS THEN WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I PLAY FOOTBALL WITH KEVIN CROWTHER FOR TEN MINUTES.AT 9.00AM WE LINE UP AND THEN WHEN I GET UP INTO THE CLASS MY CLASS IS UPSTAIRS THEN AT 9.30 I GO INTO ANOTHER CLASS THERE IS ONLY 8 PEOPLE IN THAT CLASS THEN IN 30 MINUTES I GO INTO MY PROPER CLASS THEN WE HAVE A LIVE PROGRAM THAT TAKES US TO DINNER TIME.AFTER DINNER I GO SWIMMING THEN AFTER SWIMMING I DO CLASSWORK. PAUL TATE.
